name: NPC BATTLEGROUNDs
description:
This version of the game is a single player NPC battle simulator where you have the option to play along your team of NPCs to capture & hold the enemy base for 60 seconds to win the game or spectate the battles between the NPCs with a Cinematic Camera-

Features might expand or change in the future.

Gameplay Features : Play in FPS Mode or Switch to the Cinematic Spectator Cam

Hold "Tab" in game to se the key binds 

Join the Games Discord to get more information about the game                                     Here : https://discord.gg/C3zKj3nm
